game
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  game.Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

A class that defines the properties and functionalities of the game board.

Author:
Tuure Saloheimo

Field Summary
private  Piece[][] board
          An array of Piece-objects depicting the board and the pieces on it
static java.lang.String[] COLUMNS
          A static array used to turn column numbers into letters accordingly to a standard chess board
private  java.lang.String currentGame
          A String containing the information necessary to save the game.
private  java.util.List<Piece> deadPieces
          A list of pieces that have been defeated during the course of the game

          A GameLog-object that is used to record the moves and other events taking place on the board.

          The King of Player 1
private  King kingTwo
          The King of Player 2
private  boolean playable
          A boolean value that tells whether the board is currently playable.
private  boolean whoseTurn
          A boolean value, that defines, which palyer's turn it is to move.

private Piece[][] board
An array of Piece-objects depicting the board and the pieces on it

A list of pieces that have been defeated during the course of the game

The King of Player 1

private King kingTwo
The King of Player 2

private boolean whoseTurn
A boolean value, that defines, which palyer's turn it is to move.

playable

private boolean playable
A boolean value that tells whether the board is currently playable.

gameLog

private GameLog gameLog
A GameLog-object that is used to record the moves and other events taking place on the board.

currentGame

private java.lang.String currentGame
A String containing the information necessary to save the game. Namely, the Factions of the game and the moves made.

COLUMNS

public static final java.lang.String[] COLUMNS
A static array used to turn column numbers into letters accordingly to a standard chess board

Constructor Detail

Board

public Board()
Creates a new Board-object

Method Detail

newGame

public void newGame(Faction faction1,
                    Faction faction2)
A method that initializes the board and readies it for a new game. The given parametres define the Factions taking part in the game.

Parameters:
faction1 - The Faction of Player 1
faction2 - The Faction of Player 2

getGameLog

public GameLog getGameLog()
Returns the GameLog-object assosiated with the Board object

Returns:
the GameLog-object assosiated with the Board-object

endTurn

public void endTurn()
A method that ends the current turn. If the game is over, ends the game and makes the board not playable.

gameOver

public boolean gameOver()
A method that checks whether the game is over. The game is over when the King of either player is defeated.

Returns:
true if the game is over, false if it isn't.

getWinner

public java.lang.String getWinner()
A method that returns the name of the victorious faction.

Returns:
the name of the victorious faction, or null if the game is not over yet.

isPlayable

public boolean isPlayable()
A method that tells whether the board is playable or not.

Returns:
true if the board is playable, false if it isn't

whoseTurn

public boolean whoseTurn()
A method that tells whose turn it is.

Returns:
true if it's Player 1's turn, false if Player 2's.

getPiece

public Piece getPiece(int row,
                      int column)
Returns the piece located in the square defined by the coordinates given as parametres.

Parameters:
row - The row of the square
column - The column of the square
Returns:
the Piece-object in the defined square, or null if the Piece or the square doesn't exist.

setPiece

void setPiece(Piece piece,
              int row,
              int column)
Puts the given Piece-object into the square defined by the given coordinates if the Piece is associated with this Board. If there was a Piece in the square before, it will be overwritten.

Parameters:
piece - the Piece-object to be placed on the Board
row - the row of the target square
column - the column of the target square

movePiece

void movePiece(Piece piece,
               int row,
               int column)
A method that moves the given Piece-object to the defined square in the board, if the PIece is associated with the Board. If the new coordinates fall outside of the board, only removes the piece from it's current location.

Parameters:
piece - the Piece-object to be moved into the new location
row - the row of the target square
column - the column of the target square

getDeadPieceIterator

public java.util.Iterator<Piece> getDeadPieceIterator()
Returns an Iterator over the deadPieces-list of the Board.

Returns:
an Iterator over the deadPieces-list

addDeadPiece

void addDeadPiece(Piece piece)
Adds the given Piece-object to the deadPieces-list.

Parameters:
piece - the Piece-object to be added to the deadPieces-list.

removeDeadPiece

boolean removeDeadPiece(Piece piece)
Removes the given Piece-object from the deadPieces-list if the given Piece is on the list.

Parameters:
piece - the Piece-object to be removed from the list
Returns:
true, if the piece was removed, false if it wasn't.

containsDeadPiece

boolean containsDeadPiece(Piece piece)
A method that checks whether the given Piece-object is on the deadPieces-list or not.

Parameters:
piece - the Piece-object the presence of which to be checked
Returns:
true if the Piece is present in the list, false if it isn't

containsDeadPiece

boolean containsDeadPiece(boolean team)
A method that checks whether there are Piece-objects of the given team present on the deadPieces-list.

Parameters:
team - the team the pieces of which to be searched for
Returns:
true if a piece belonging to the given team is found, false if none is found.

containsDeadOfficer

boolean containsDeadOfficer(boolean team)
A method that checks whether the deadPieces-list contains officer (i.e. non-pawn) pieces of the given team.

Parameters:
team - the team, the officers of which are to be searched
Returns:
true, if an officer was found, false if none was.

resurrectPiece

Piece resurrectPiece(boolean team)
A method that compiles a list of pieces that can be resurrected by the given team and then sends forward a request for the player to choose one from the list.

Parameters:
team - the team performing the resurrection
Returns:
the Piece.object to be resurrected, or null if none was chosen.

reanimatePiece

Piece reanimatePiece(boolean team,
                     Faction faction)
A method that compiles a list of Pieces that can be reanimated by the given team and then sends forward a request for the player to choose s piece to be reanimated.

Parameters:
team - the team performing the reanimation
faction - the faction of the Piece performing the reanimation.
Returns:
the Piece chosen to be used, or null if none was chosen.

enhancePawn

java.lang.String enhancePawn(int row,
                             int column)
A method that compiles a list of Pieces that can be used to enhance a Pawn located in the given coordinates and then sends forward a request for the player to choose one amongst them. It then replaces the Pawn with it's Faction's equivalent of the chosen piece. Then it returns the name of the replacing piece.

Parameters:
row - the row of the Pawn's location
column - the column of the Pawn's location
Returns:
the name of the Piece that replaced the Pawn, or null if the replacement was not succesfull.

promotePawn

void promotePawn(Faction faction,
                 int row,
                 int column,
                 boolean team)
A method used for promoting Pawns that reach the end of the Board. Gets a list of the possible promotions and then sends forward a request for the player to choose a promotion among them.

Parameters:
faction - the Faction the Pawn belongs to
row - the row of the Pawn's location
column - the column of the Pawn's location
team - the team the Pawn belongs to

askPiece

private Piece askPiece(java.util.List<Piece> pieces,
                       java.lang.String message)
A method that prompts an InputDialog asking for the Player to choose a piece from the list. It then returns the chosen Piece.

Parameters:
pieces - the List of Pieces to be chosen amongst
message - the message to be displayed with the choice
Returns:
the Piece-object the player chose, or null if none was chosen.

inform

public void inform(java.lang.String string)
A method used to inform the Board of an event occurring durin the game.

Parameters:
string - the event that occurred

addMove

public void addMove(java.lang.String string)
A method used to add moves to the Board' memory in order to make it possible to save the game

Parameters:
string - the move made

loadGame

public void loadGame()
              throws LoadException
A method used to load the game from the file "save.txt"

Throws:
LoadException - if for some reason the loading proves unsuccesful

saveGame

public void saveGame()
              throws SaveException
A method used to sace the game to the file "save.txt"

Throws:
SaveException - if saving the game for some reason proves unsuccesful

isOnBoard

public static boolean isOnBoard(int row,
                                int column)
A method that can be used to check that the location defined by certain coordinates fall's on the Board.

Parameters:
row - the row of the location
column - the column of the location
Returns:
true, if the location is on a Board, false otherwise
